pages.system: page_title = System page_hint = System settings dbclean_title = Database cleanup journal_title = Leave the last in the event journal tables_title = Leave the last in the value tables clean_button = Clean clean_hint = Clean now autoclean_off = Turn off automatic cleaning autoclean_on = Turn on automatic cleaning every record_measure = records minute_measure = minutes hour_measure = hour day_measure = days start_from = starting apply_button = Apply apply_hint = Apply entered parameters table_name = Table name_hint = Table name in database table_rows = Rows rows_hint = Records count in table table_note = Description table_unuse = Table unuse shutdown_button = Shutdown shutdown_hint = Shutdown the operating system exit_button = Exit exit_hint = Application close reboot_button = Reboot reboot_hint = Reboot the operating system
pages.about: page_title = About page_hint = System Information board_title = Board type temperature_title = CPU temperature osname_title = Operating system osversion_title = OS version osarch_title = Architecture javaversion_title = Java version dbserver_title = Database server dbmsystem_title = DBMS dbmsystem_hint = Database Management System dbname_title = Database project_title = Project solution_title = Solution website_title = Project site device_title = Device device_description = Description description_hint = Device description device_pins = Pins device_hint = Device pin controller_hint = Controller pin address_hint = Remote controller address busaddress_hint = I2C bus address buschannel_hint = SPI bus channel dberror_title = No database connect message_title = Message trace_title = Stack trace detail_title = Detail

journal.information: any_message = %s% apply_properties = Project properties loaded init_configs = Project configuration loaded init_database = Database %s% is ready to use create_table = Table %s% created erase_table = Table %s% erased drop_table = Table %s% deleted delete_table = Deletion in table %s% save_variables = Variable %s% saved (value is %s%) load_variables = Variable %s% loaded delete_variables = Variable %s% deleted save_leversset = Management parameters configuration %s% saved load_leversset = Management parameters configuration %s% loaded delete_leversset = Management parameters configuration %s% deleted add_user = User %s% with role %s% added change_user = User %s% with role %s% changed delete_user = User %s% deleted init_device = Devices successfully initialized complite_task = %s%: task complited init_tasks = Tasks initialized set_value = The variable %s% (%s%) is set to: %s% init_window = The main application window is open start_server = Web server started
journal.warning: any_message = %s% drop_database = Database %s% deleted! create_database = Database %s% created clean_database = Database cleaned. %s% value records and %s% journal notes deleted turnon_clean = Set up automatic database cleanup with a period %s% %s%, first start: %s% turnoff_clean = Automatic database cleanup canceled interrupte_task = %s%: task aborted start_tasks = Tasks started pause_tasks = Tasks paused stop_tasks = Tasks stoped set_random = Variable %s% (%s%). %s% random values added init_window = The application works without launching the main window close_window = Closing the application from the main window on the server add_user = You cannot add a user %s%! shutdown_system = Shutdown the system from the web interface (user: %s%, address: %s%) exit_program = Close application from the web interface (user: %s%, address: %s%) reboot_system = Reboot the system from the web interface (user: %s%, address: %s%))
journal.error: any_message = %s% apply_properties = Error loading project properties. Message: %s% init_configs = Error loading project configuration. Message: %s% table_exists = Table %s% search error. Message: %s% create_table = Table %s% create error. Message: %s% drop_table = Table %s% drop error. Message: %s% init_database = Database %s% initialization error. Message: %s% save_variables = Variable updating error (%s% = %s%). Message: %s% load_variables = Variable loading error (%s%). Message: %s% delete_variables = Variable deleting error (%s%). Message: %s% save_leversset = Error saving a configuration %s%. Message: %s% save_leversset = Error loading a configuration %s%. Message: %s% change_user = User change error. Message: %s% get_user = Error getting user %s%. Message: %s% crypt_password = Encryption error. Message: %s% set_value = Failed to set %s% (%s%) to %s%. Message: %s% get_value = Error getting value for %s% (%s%). Message: %s% open_browser = Unsuccessful attempt to open a browser. Message: %s% busy_port = Port %s% is busy start_server = Error starting web server. Message: %s% shutdown_error = Command %s% execution error. Message: %s% overlap_pin = Overlap pin in device %s%
